snippet.title: Oblivion Override Exclusive Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Oblivion Override is a 2D side-scrolling action roguelike set in a post-apocalyptic mechanical world with a futuristic cartoon touch. Oblivion Override is being developed by indie game studio Humble Mill.

The game takes place in a robotic era where humanity is a thing of the past. Robots still bear the shackles of the Oblivion Code - a failsafe program designed by their creators to neutralize hostile AI evolution.

#oblivionoverride #gaming
